citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1155 on
12/16/2015. The APHIS official was able to make contact with a facility representative by phone. However; a
facility representative was not available for inspection within a reasonable amount of time after contact was made.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1155 on
12/16/2015.  The APHIS official was able to make contact with a facility representative by phone.  However; a
facility representative was not available for inspection within a reasonable amount of time after contact was made.
